name: Discord (macOS)
description: Optimized for Discord on macOS - normal window level with cycle participation
explanation: Discord's screen sharing on macOS requires windows to participate in the window cycle (macos_participates_in_cycle=true) to appear in the picker. Normal window level (macos_floating_level=false) prevents it from staying always-on-top which could interfere with app switcher. Sharing type 1 (kCGWindowSharingNone) allows the window to be captured by screen recording APIs. Click-through enabled for non-intrusive overlay behavior.
